div.ab: " ], son of Harpsemis, 8 dr.,;], son of Harpsemis, 4dr.,;] es, son of Sisois, 8 dr.,;], son of Petesouchos, 4 dr.,;]s, son of Thotortaios dr.,;], son of Ischyrion .so(), 4 dr.,;], Panetbys, 4 dr.,;], son of Panetbys, 4 dr.,;[traces of 15 lines];;Ptollis, son of Praxias, 4 dr.,;Praxias, son of P. . ., 4 dr.,;Harphaesis, son of Dikranes, 8 dr. with the addition;;Peteuchos, son of Dikranes, 4 dr.,;Theon, son of Dikranes, 4 dr.,;Herakles, son of Dikranes, 4 dr.,;Hatres, son of Ischyrion, 12 dr.,;Petesouchos, son of Ischyrion, 36 dr.,;Kollouthos, son of Psenatymis the older, 20 dr.,;Horos, likewise son of Atilon, 8 dr.,;Herakles, son of Horos, son of Atilon, 4dr.,;Hatres, son of Herakles, 8 dr.
